creator: BigDream Solutions
descriptionHtml:
Startup 360 app is dedicated to an Entrepreneur to understand how to start a business.

Startup news from all over the world are updated regularly and users are boosted with motivational quotes to implement their start up business ideas.

App also has a GUIDE section which helps in starting a business, understanding the real startup meaning and to know the right time for startup funding.

So enjoy Startup 360 app and get various successful Startup Stories, latest News and unique Startup Ideas at one place.
descriptionShort: Startup NEWS, Motivational QUOTES, Startup IDEAS & STORIES with Business GUIDE

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
UI improvement
Dark and Light mode added
Tech changes and fixes

title: Startup 360 - News, Stories, Ideas, Guide & Quotes

creator: BigDream Solutions
descriptionHtml:
Startup 360 app is dedicated to all Entrepreneurs to understand everything about Startup and Business.

You can Connect with other Entrepreneurs, and find Developers, Partners, and Investors.

Get a daily motivational Quote to start your day full of energy. App also has a startup Guide section which helps in starting a business, understanding the meaning of a real startup, and knowing the right time for funding.

You will also get access to various successful startup Stories and unique startup Ideas in one place. So enjoy Startup 360 app to Learn, Connect, and Grow.
descriptionShort: Startup Ideas, Business Guide, Startup Stories, Connect with others & Grow.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New feature added: Startup-Connect
In-App Review option available

title:
Startup 360: Learn & Connect
3.2.4.2

creator: Bigdream Solutions
descriptionHtml:
Ignite your entrepreneurial spirit with Startup 360, your all-in-one app designed to guide you every step of the way to a successful startup!

Are you ready to turn your innovative startup ideas into a thriving business? Startup 360 is your comprehensive toolkit, providing the essential resources, knowledge, and connections you need to build and grow a start up.

Explore Our Key Sections:

▪️"Quotes" Section: Fuel your drive with daily motivational quotes from top entrepreneurs and business leaders.

▪️"Guide" Section: Access in-depth start up guides, learn how to start a startup, discover essential startup funding strategies, and master the art of creating compelling pitch presentations. Discover the steps to launch and scale your start up and building a sustainable business.

▪️"Connect" Section:
- Network with fellow entrepreneurs, find developers, and connect with potential investors.
- Pitch your startup for investment and secure crucial funding.
- Share and validate your business ideas with the community.
- Showcase your brand and sell your technology or startup.

▪️"Ideas" Section: Explore a treasure trove of innovative startup ideas and generate fresh concepts to inspire your next venture.

▪️"Quiz" Section: Test your knowledge of startup and business terms with engaging quizzes.

Key Features:

▪️Connect & Collaborate: Network with fellow entrepreneurs, find developers, and connect with potential investors.
▪️Learn & Grow: Access insightful articles, take engaging quizzes, and discover a wealth of startup knowledge. Learn how to start a startup and grow your business.
▪️Find Inspiration: Explore a treasure trove of innovative startup ideas and get daily motivational quotes to keep you inspired.
▪️Build Your Foundation: Learn the fundamentals of business planning, from idea validation to legal and financial considerations, including crucial startup funding advice.
▪️Startup Funding: Navigate the complexities of startup funding with expert advice. Learn when and how to raise capital, and discover strategies for securing investment.
▪️Comprehensive business and start up guide, including "how to start up" a business.
▪️Detailed pitch presentation guide.
▪️User-friendly interface.
▪️Regularly updated content.

Why Choose Startup 360?

Startup 360 provides a structured and efficient platform for startup growth. Our organized sections empower you to focus on the resources most relevant to your needs. This app is for anyone that wants to begin a start up or a startup.

Install Startup 360 today and embark on your entrepreneurial journey!

Don't wait! Start building your dream business now. Get started with Startup 360 and join a vibrant community of entrepreneurs. Transform your ideas into reality. Download Startup 360 and begin your journey to startup success!
descriptionShort: Startup ideas, motivational quotes, startup funding, business and start up guide
title:
Startup 360: Grow Your Startup
